text.text_translated:
Julie Wong is an important researcher. She studies robots and computers that can think.

She wrote more than 50 papers. She wrote some papers alone and some with other people. The papers are in good science magazines.

She often speaks at big meetings in different countries. In 2012, she won a very important prize.

Julie lives with her family. They live in a special smart home with computers. She made the plan for the house herself.
